summary: REQ-20 and REQ-21 appear implemented via dynamic AdSense loader injection in `frontend/index.html` and default env var configuration in `frontend/.env.example`. However, the diff summary indicates additional AdSense ad placement and ad-slot configuration work that was not requested and may violate the stated non-goals (no new ad unit placements/layout changes).

hallucinated_features.description: Added (or changed) AdSense ad unit placement(s) in the Home page layout (e.g., an above-content AdSense placement).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states this task is only about adding the AdSense <head> verification/loader script and explicitly lists as a non-goal adding new AdSense ad unit placements or changing ad slot layout/positions.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (HomePage described as having a "single above-content AdSense ad placement")

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a centralized AdSense configuration module that reads additional ad slot IDs (top/middle/footer) from environment variables.
hallucinated_features.reason: Only `VITE_ADSENSE_CLIENT_ID` default configuration and ensuring the loader script is present in <head> were requested; managing multiple ad slot IDs/config modules is out of scope for the request and aligns with adding/altering ad placement infrastructure.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions `frontend/src/config/adsense.ts` reading client ID and three ad slot IDs)
